attributes.review: This app started playing vulgar material as soon as  I opened it!! not happy about it!!! considering withdrawing my support from the orange one!!!
Honestly I came in not expecting much from this. Needless to say I was not surprised. Severely disappointed.
attributes.title: I’m not a supporter, but
